DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate cerebral oxygenation with Near infrared spectrophotometry (NIRS) at the hypernatremic dehydration in newborns.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Cerebral Oxygenation With Near Infrared Spectrophotometry (NIRS) at the Hypernatremic Dehydration in Newborn
